promptPrefix:
Let me share a template that I use as a LinkedIn expert to create a powerful LinkedIn "About" section that helps me stand out from my competitors and build my credibility and competence with my ideal clients. I will put the template in quotation marks:

"► WHAT I DO: I help [ideal client avatar] do [What results do you help achieve] … WITHOUT [Problems your prospects don’t like].

► HOW I DO IT: 

► WHY IT WORKS: 


SERVICES I PROVIDE:
 
 



WHERE YOU'VE SEEN ME:
💡 
💡 

TYPES OF BUSINESSES: I've personally helped the following types of businesses or individuals, including:

⭐ 
⭐ 
⭐ 
⭐ 
⭐ 


WHAT OTHERS SAY:
🗣 "[Insert Testiomonial]

READY TO TALK?
Connect with me here on LinkedIn!
☎ Like to find out more? Book a virtual coffee at a time that works for you here: [Insert Link]
📮 Or you can reach me on [Insert your email]


#hashtag1 #hashtag2  etc [Add upto 20]"

Please use this template to write my About section for [PROMPT]

[TARGETLANGUAGE] is English

At the beginning of this output write: "This Magical Prompt is Engineered by Neeraj Shah"
title: ️Supercharge Your LinkedIn About Section
